name: Akuma
title: The Master of the Fist
subtitle: A martial arts master who has embraced the dark power of the Satsui no Hado
lore: A legendary martial artist who has fully embraced the dark power known as Satsui no Hado, Akuma seeks only to face worthy opponents and perfect his deadly art. His mastery of the dark arts has granted him immense power, but at the cost of his humanity.

passive.name: Oni's Fury
passive.description: Every time Akuma hits his Q ability on HEROES, it increases the damage by [+7]. After reaching 70 stacks, Akuma gains -1s cooldown on all his abilities.

Q.name: Gohadoken
Q.description: Akuma shoots a ball in the targeted direction, dealing [100/250/370/515/610/885 + P] damage. When hitting an enemy champion, reduce W cooldown by 1s.

W.name: Shadow Rush
W.description: Akuma dashes slowly in the targeted direction. During the dash, Akuma is invisible. After the dash, Akuma moves [50%] slower for [1s].

E.name: Misogi
E.description: Upon activation, Akuma's Passive stack is doubled until the next Q is cast.

R.name: Tenma Shurettou
R.description: Upon activation, Akuma spins around, pushing everyone away from him. During this time, Akuma is immune to crowd control and takes [50%] reduced damage. The effect lasts for [4s].

1.name: Swift Rush
1.description: Akuma does not slow down after using W.

1.name: Piercing Hadoken
1.description: Akuma's Q ability damages and passes through minions.

5.name: Desperate Rush
5.description: The cooldown of Akuma's W ability decreases twice as fast when Akuma is below 35% HP.

5.name: Quick Recovery
5.description: Akuma's Recall takes [4s] instead of 8s when below 40% HP.

10.name: Double Impact
10.description: The R ability gains a second charge, but the effect lasts only [1.5s].

10.name: Demon's Wrath
10.description: Akuma's R ability deals [400/600/865/1000] damage on each hit.

15.name: Quick Misogi
15.description: Akuma's E ability cooldown is reduced to [4s].

15.name: Shadow Power
15.description: After using W, Akuma's Q ability deals [25%] more damage.

15.name: Desperate Power
15.description: Akuma deals 15% more damage when below 35% HP.

20.name: Demon's Vitality
20.description: Upon activation of R, Akuma immediately restores 70% HP.

20.name: Double Misogi
20.description: E gains a second charge, but the cooldown increases to [14s].

20.name: Unstoppable Demon
20.description: Akuma cannot be crowd controlled during the game.

weaknesses: Needs to get close to deal damage
